src:
Jadwal Pertandingan Shopee Liga 1 Hari Ini, Selasa 5 November 2019
05 Nov 2019, 09:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pekan ke-27 kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 telah memasuki hari kedua. Ada satu pertandingan yang akan digelar hari ini, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Borneo FC akan menjamu Perseru Badak Lampung FC di Stadion Segiri, Samarinda.
Borneo saat ini menempati peringkat 4 dengan perolehan 41 poin dari 25 pertandingan (M10 S11 K4). Sementara itu, Badak Lampung berada di posisi 15 dengan 26 poin dari 26 laga (M6 S8 K12).
Borneo bertekad usai kalah 0-1 melawan tuan rumah Barito Putera. Namun, laga ini berpotensi menyulitkan. Pasalnya, Badak Lampung mengusung motivasi tinggi setelah menang 4-3 menjamu Arema FC.
Berikut jadwal lengkapnya.
text:
Shopee League 1 Match Schedule Today, Tuesday 5 November 2019
05 Nov 2019, 09:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Week 27 of the 2019 Shopee League competition has entered its second day. There is one match that will be held today, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Borneo FC will host Perseru Badak Lampung FC at Segiri Stadium, Samarinda.
Borneo is currently ranked 4th with 41 points from 25 matches (M10 S11 K4). Meanwhile, Lampung Rhinos are in 15th position with 26 points from 26 matches (M6 S8 K12).
Borneo determined after losing 0-1 against host Barito Putera. However, this fight has the potential to be difficult. Because the Lampung Rhinos carry high motivation after winning 4-3 entertaining Arema FC.
The following is the complete schedule.
